page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: {Knights Grange Sports Centre-WINSFORD Built on the site of a 16th Century Farmhouse and Barn this centre offers facilities for golf,tennis,bowls, athletics,football,hockey,rugby, cricket and crazy golf. This complex is an ideal venue for the whole family and instruction is available in all activities. The complex is open seven days a week from 8am-dusk.Equipment hire is available. There are excellent changing/toilet facilities.An indoor hall is available for social functions and there is also a licensed public house providing refreshments and substantial meals.In June 1985 evenings and weekends are busy at Knights Grange.Many people use the area for walking and picnics. Future improvements are to include a 9 hole golf course extending the existing golf course to 18 holes.
